title: 小潘潘、小峰峰 - 學貓叫『你不說愛我我就喵喵喵~』【動態歌詞Lyrics】

json.text:
00:00:08,280 --> 00:00:12,120
Let us mimic how cats meow, together (we) meow meow meow meow

00:00:12,620 --> 00:00:16,500
Being affectionate to you, aiyo meow meow meow meow meow
My heart is pounding hard, obsessed with how you smirk
If you don't say you love me I will meow meow meow
Everyday I need your hug
Cherish every second we are together
You know how important you are to me more than I do
You are my heroine
Sometimes I am as lazy as a cat
Have bad temper and threaten you with my teeth and claws
You are always so nice and melt my heart
I want to be your little kitty
Let us mimic how cats meow, together (we) meow meow meow meow
Being affectionate to you, aiyo meow meow meow meow meow
My heart is pounding hard, obsessed with how you smirk
If you don't say you love me I will meow meow meow
Let us mimic how cats meow, together (we) meow meow meow meow
I want to wear your jacket and smell your smell
Want to be your kitty, want to cuddle in the bed with you
Everyday obsessed by how nice you are
Sometimes I am as lazy as a cat
Have a bad temper and threaten you with my teeth and claws
You are always so nice, melting my heart down
I want to be your little kitty
Let us mimic how cats meow meow meow, together we meow meow meow meow meow
Being affectionate to you, aiyo meow meow meow meow meow
My heart is pounding hard, obsessed with your smirk
Say you love me or I will meow meow meow
Let us mimic how cats meow, together (we) meow meow meow meow
I want to wear your jacket, smell your smell
Want to be your cat, cuddle in your hug to sleep
Everyday obsessed by how nice you are

Being affectionate to you, aiyo meow meow meow meow meow
My heart is pounding hard, obsessed with your smirk
If you don't say you love me I will meow meow meow meow
Let us mimic how cats meow, together we meow meow meow meow meow
I want to wear your jacket and smell your smell
Want to be your cat, fall asleep in your hug
Everyday obsessed by how nice you are
